author: Staff Reporter
text:
Vadaseri police have arrested a private finance company official on a charge of stealing 496 sovereigns of gold ornaments pledged by customers at its Kulasekaram branch while bringing them to the regional office in Vadaseri on Saturday.

According to police, Biju Chacco, manager of Kulasekaram branch of the finance company, was entrusted with the task of handing over the ornaments to the regional office for safekeeping in a strongroom. It was alleged that Biju took the jewels to his residence in Kulasekaram, and informed Regional Manager Sankara Narayanan that the jewels went missing when he was carrying them to Nagercoil on a bike.

On a complaint lodged by Mr. Sankara Narayanan, special police teams started investigations. On suspicion, the police took Biju into custody and questioned him. Biju reportedly confessed to have committed the crime. The police on Monday recovered the gold ornaments kept in his house.

Vadaseri police have registered a case, and are investigating.
title: Finance firm manager held; 496 sovereigns recovered
